__e: And don't forget, you told me Nick was a Grimm.
If you're interested in your friend ever being a Grimm again, let's board up the window and get back to work.
All right, now, I just want to say, for a roommate who's a Grimm... and I really mean this...
I didn't think it was possible to fight on the same side as a Grimm.
So what I'm trying to say is, maybe we should just give it a little time to see if not being a Grimm is better than being one.
No, no, no, it's not that I don't want you to help Nick, but being a Grimm hasn't exactly been the greatest thing for him or me.
